pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
Garmin GTC570 Overlay Bezel
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION - http://www.simstrumentation.com
- **v1.1** (Feb 18, 2023) - removed specific HJet support and new HJet uses standard AAU I events - added touch zones around left joystick knob for joystick directional control
NOTES: - Select which position the unit will occupy via user properties. Can be placed in positions 1, 2, or 3. - V2 of the HJet now uses standard H: events. There is no longer a need for a specific HJet user property - For the HJet, GTC positions are Position 2 for the left unit, Position 1 for the right unit. This is backwards from what it should logically be, but this is the way the plane is coded. There's nothing we can do to change that.
